_description: On sin and repentance — five lines with Latin key words, ‘Desine’ &c.

BLAdd11579.Transcription:
Let þy senneAnd wep for þy senneAnd ber þy
                    sennehold þy penaunceAnd haue heuen
BLAdd11579.Note:
English written in rubricated letters around the Latin key
                    words.
